tool_description: Generates formatted PDF receipts with order details, customer information, and company branding for attachment to notifications.

order_date.description: Date and time of the order

payment_method.description: Payment method used (e.g., 'Credit Card ending in 1234')

logo_url.description: URL to company logo for receipt header

error_messages: Invalid order data: All required order fields must be provided and valid
Invalid email format: Customer email must be in valid email format
Invalid date format: Order date must be in ISO 8601 format
Invalid currency: Currency must be a valid 3-letter ISO code
PDF generation failed: Unable to create PDF due to system error or invalid data
Invalid amounts: Tax and shipping amounts must be non-negative numbers
usage: Provide complete order and customer information along with financial details. Optionally specify company branding elements. The tool generates a formatted PDF receipt.

pdf_filename.description: Generated filename for the PDF receipt

pdf_size_bytes.description: Size of the generated PDF file in bytes

pdf_base64.description: Base64 encoded PDF content for attachment
